languages.text: "Но какой вокс подхватит твой голос в пустоте? Кто твои друзья, что перескажут слова Джай Хейдари в организации? Вольный Торговец? Нет, кто твои друзья в организации? Их нет... хотя когда-то были". {n}Пощада взирает на Джай покровительственно и со странным сочувствием.{/n}

"But what vox will pick up your voice in the void? What friends will repeat Jae Heydari's words spoken here? The Rogue Trader? No — what friends in the organisation? You have none... though you once did." {n}Mercy's gaze on Jae is patronising and strangely sympathetic.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но какой вокс подхватит твой голос в пустоте? Кто твои друзья, что перескажут слова Джай Хейдари в организации? Вольный Торговец? Нет, кто твои друзья в организации? Их нет... хотя когда-то были". {n}Пощада взирает на Джай покровительственно и со странным сочувствием.{/n}

traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: “可在这虚空之中，还有谁能听到你的声音？还有哪个朋友会支持婕伊·海达利的发言？行商浪人吗？不。你在组织里，还有什么朋友吗？你已经连一个朋友都不剩了……虽然说，你曾经有过。”{n}悯慈看着婕伊，目光中充满了优越与怪异的同情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But what vox will pick up your voice in the void? What friends will repeat Jae Heydari's words spoken here? The Rogue Trader? No — what friends in the organisation? You have none... though you once did." {n}Mercy's gaze on Jae is patronising and strangely sympathetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “可在这虚空之中，还有谁能听到你的声音？还有哪个朋友会支持婕伊·海达利的发言？行商浪人吗？不。你在组织里，还有什么朋友吗？你已经连一个朋友都不剩了……虽然说，你曾经有过。”{n}悯慈看着婕伊，目光中充满了优越与怪异的同情。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: 「しかし、お前の言葉を虚空の中で拾うヴォクスなどあるだろうか？ここでジェイ・ヘイダリの言葉を繰り返す仲間がいるだろうか？自由開拓者か？否。組織にどんな仲間がいる？お前には一人もいない…かつては、いただろうがな」{n}マーシーのジェイに対する視線は、恩着せがましく、妙に同情的だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But what vox will pick up your voice in the void? What friends will repeat Jae Heydari's words spoken here? The Rogue Trader? No — what friends in the organisation? You have none... though you once did." {n}Mercy's gaze on Jae is patronising and strangely sympathetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「しかし、お前の言葉を虚空の中で拾うヴォクスなどあるだろうか？ここでジェイ・ヘイダリの言葉を繰り返す仲間がいるだろうか？自由開拓者か？否。組織にどんな仲間がいる？お前には一人もいない…かつては、いただろうがな」{n}マーシーのジェイに対する視線は、恩着せがましく、妙に同情的だ。{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: «Pero ¿qué voco captará tu voz cuando dejes de existir? ¿Qué amigos repetirán las palabras que ha pronunciado aquí la gran Jae Heydari? ¿{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente? No. ¿Qué amigos tienes en la organización? Ninguno... aunque no siempre fue ese el caso». {n}La mirada que Mercy dedica a Jae es condescendiente y extrañamente compasiva.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But what vox will pick up your voice in the void? What friends will repeat Jae Heydari's words spoken here? The Rogue Trader? No — what friends in the organisation? You have none... though you once did." {n}Mercy's gaze on Jae is patronising and strangely sympathetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero ¿qué voco captará tu voz cuando dejes de existir? ¿Qué amigos repetirán las palabras que ha pronunciado aquí la gran Jae Heydari? ¿{mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente? No. ¿Qué amigos tienes en la organización? Ninguno... aunque no siempre fue ese el caso». {n}La mirada que Mercy dedica a Jae es condescendiente y extrañamente compasiva.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: « Mais quel vox captera ta voix dans l'espace ? Quels amis pourront bien répéter les mots prononcés par Jae Heydari ici même ? {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ? Non... Quels amis dans cette organisation ? Tu n'en as aucun... Plus maintenant. » {n}Le regard que pose Mercy sur Jae est à la fois condescendant et étrangement compatissant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But what vox will pick up your voice in the void? What friends will repeat Jae Heydari's words spoken here? The Rogue Trader? No — what friends in the organisation? You have none... though you once did." {n}Mercy's gaze on Jae is patronising and strangely sympathetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais quel vox captera ta voix dans l'espace ? Quels amis pourront bien répéter les mots prononcés par Jae Heydari ici même ? {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} ? Non... Quels amis dans cette organisation ? Tu n'en as aucun... Plus maintenant. » {n}Le regard que pose Mercy sur Jae est à la fois condescendant et étrangement compatissant.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Aber welches Vox werdet Ihr in der Leere erreichen? Welche Freunde werden Jae Heydaris hier gesprochene Worte wiederholen? {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin}? Nein – welche Freunde in der Organisation? Ihr habt keine ... zumindest keine mehr." {n}Mercys Blick auf Jae ist herablassend, aber irgendwie auch merkwürdig wohlgesonnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But what vox will pick up your voice in the void? What friends will repeat Jae Heydari's words spoken here? The Rogue Trader? No — what friends in the organisation? You have none... though you once did." {n}Mercy's gaze on Jae is patronising and strangely sympathetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aber welches Vox werdet Ihr in der Leere erreichen? Welche Freunde werden Jae Heydaris hier gesprochene Worte wiederholen? {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin}? Nein – welche Freunde in der Organisation? Ihr habt keine ... zumindest keine mehr." {n}Mercys Blick auf Jae ist herablassend, aber irgendwie auch merkwürdig wohlgesonnen.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Ama uçsuzda yankılanan sesini hangi voks yakalayacak? Jae Heydari'nin burada söylediği sözleri hangi arkadaşı tekrar edecek? Hür Tacir mi? Hayır. Organizasyonda kimlerle arkadaşsın? Hiç arkadaşın yok. Bir zamanlar vardı ama." {n}Merhamet'in Jae'e yönelttiği bakışları küstahlıkla dolu olduğu kadar tuhaf bir sempati de barındırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But what vox will pick up your voice in the void? What friends will repeat Jae Heydari's words spoken here? The Rogue Trader? No — what friends in the organisation? You have none... though you once did." {n}Mercy's gaze on Jae is patronising and strangely sympathetic.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ama uçsuzda yankılanan sesini hangi voks yakalayacak? Jae Heydari'nin burada söylediği sözleri hangi arkadaşı tekrar edecek? Hür Tacir mi? Hayır. Organizasyonda kimlerle arkadaşsın? Hiç arkadaşın yok. Bir zamanlar vardı ama." {n}Merhamet'in Jae'e yönelttiği bakışları küstahça ama aynı zamanda tuhaf derecede sempati dolu.{/n}
traits.speaker: Mercy
